title: Doctor
description: A person who has advanced knowledge of medical practices. Possessing this specialty allows the user the ability to use healing abilities.

title: Hunter
description: A mostly self-taught person who has learned the ways of the land. Possessing this specialty gives the user the ability to be more efficient in hunting and gathering food.

title: Researcher
